data.prayer: Lord, stir the hearts of your people in the county of Sindhudurg to agree with you in prayer.
data.verse: I [Jesus] pray also for those who will believe in me through their message, that all of them may be one, Father, just as you are in me and I am in you. May they also be in us so that the world may believe that you have sent me.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Sindhudurg, Maharashtra, India
data.section_summary: What beauty can God be thanked for in this photo?

data.prayer: Lord, raise up apostolic workers to plant churches in every town in the county of Sindhudurg.
data.verse: The reason I left you in Crete was that you might put in order what was left unfinished and appoint elders in every town, as I directed you.

data.prayer: Spirit, make the Word of God a delight to the people of Sindhudurg, like it was to David.
data.verse: I delight in your decrees; I will not neglect your Word.

data.prayer: Father, please give the people in the county of Sindhudurg access to a Bible in their own language.
Lord we ask you on behalf of the Alitkar Salankar people. 0.0% are known to be believers. Oh God, please share with them the great gift of your son Jesus and your kingdom.
Father, please give the church in the county of Sindhudurg prophets who can build up holiness and faithfulness to you.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Jesus, like with the centurion who came to you for his sick servant, please call into your house those who have great faith but are not yet yours in the county of Sindhudurg
data.verse: When Jesus heard these things, he marveled at him, and turning to the crowd that followed him, said, “I tell you, not even in Israel have I found such faith.” And when those who had been sent returned to the house, they found the servant well.

data.prayer: God in Heaven, only you can and should appoint evangelists. Please, appoint and send more to Sindhudurg, Maharashtra, India.
data.verse: And in the church God has appointed first of all apostles, second prophets, third teachers, then workers of miracles, and those with gifts of healing, helping, administration, and various tongues.

location.name: Sindhudurg
location.people_groups_list: Bedar Kakamundi, Bawtar, Sardar (Hindu traditions), Lingader, Bedar Kashmir (Muslim traditions)
